title: Investigating How Genomic Contexts Impact IS5 Transposition Within the
authors: Onstead J, Zhang Z, Huo J, Ord JW, Smith S, Saier MH
abstract: Insertions of the transposable element IS5 into its target sites in response to stressful environmental conditions, DNA structures, and DNA-binding proteins are well studied, but how the genomic contexts near IS5's native loci impact its transpositions is largely unknown. Here, by examining the roles of all 11 copies of IS5 within the genome of
